10016000.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「むかーし 赤:
Once upon a time, the people of this country suffered from a red calamity, and they praised each other for overcoming the calamity, and
red was chosen as the color of victory. With a little bit of a nod to that history, I made a letter card of Glen Castle dyed by the setting
sun. I'm already getting a lot of reservations!

10016001.「この先は ご遠慮ください。\n<br>\n「町のみんなのために\n 新たな住宅:
Please refrain from continuing. We are in the
process of building a new residential area for
everyone in town.

48546.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「重い病気で 床:
King Bagudo, who was bedridden due to a serious illness, was saved by Sage Malynn's healing technique, it seems. Wow, sage techniques are amazing things.
But if you're lookin' for healing powers, the herbs I grow are nothing to scoff at. After all, they can be used on anyone.
...By the way, from the looks of you, you seem to be quite skilled. How about it, can you take on a job for me?
To be honest, I'm short on the Muddy Hand Mud that I use as potting soil for the medicinal herbs, and I'm in a bind.
Muddy Hand Mud is dropped by <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>s on the south side of Glen Territory East; think you can get me some?

48547.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「おお 引き受け:
Oh, you'll take care of it for me! I owe you one! I'm sure I've got something to repay you with.
Also, they tend to blend in with the landscape of Glen Territory East. But if you watch carefully, you'll find them. Good luck!

48548.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「おお 引き受け:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>Oh, you'll take care of it for me! I owe you one!
...But you look like you've got a lot of work to do
already, don't you.
My job can wait, don't worry; so once you've got some
more free time, pleas come back again.

48549.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「そうか……。やはり:
Is that right... Guess I'll have to go myself after all, huh.
But if I leave these potted plants now, who knows what'll happen to the medicinal herbs I took the trouble of growing...?

48550.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「マドハン泥を 薬草:

high-quality medicinal herbs, but I used too much
and ran out.<open_irai><bw_break>

Hand Mud for me, didn't you? Ha, hurry up and show me!

48552.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「……そうか。オレの:
<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>...Is that right. Looks like I jumped to the wrong
conclusion. I thought I had somehow smelled the rich
aroma particular to Muddy Hand Mud...

48553.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「おお なんと:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>Ooh, what magnificent Muddy Hand Mud it is! With this,
I'll be able to grow the best medicinal herbs...
I appreciate it! Please take this!

48960.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「……ん 何か言:
...Hmm, got something you want to say? Aah, you must think it's weird for a rugged warrior like me to be so worked up over medicinal herbs, don't you.
As a matter of fact, I was once told the something by King Bagudo. Warriors. We think of medicinal herbs as friends, and try to grow them.
''Hearts that think of their friends will grow and become hearts of those who think of the nation, and those hearts will make the nation strong... He said.
Because of the King's words, in Glen, growing these medicinal herbs is a prerogative of warriors, and those who grow the best herbs are highly respected.

48554.バンに マドハン泥を 渡しますか？<yesno><case 1><break><: Give Bam the Muddy Hand Mud?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

48555.<pc>は バンに マドハン泥を渡した！: <pc> gave Bam a Muddy Hand Mud!

48556.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「バグド王を尊敬:
For us warriors of Glen who respect King Bagudo, growing medicinal herbs for our companions is seen as the etiquette of warriors.
...And, to tell you the truth, every year there's a contest to recognize the best medicinal herb grower in Glen Castle sponsored by the King.
Last year, I came so close to losing, but with this soil, I'm sure to be this year's winner! GAHAHAHA. Alllright, I'll use this to make my comeback!

61086.<icon_exc>「せ 先生！\n<br>\n「はっ！ す すいません！ 突然:
Te-teacher! Hah! I-I'm sorry! That was unexpected!
My name is Shurina, and I'm an aspiring actress. But I've been having trouble finding a good teacher for my acting studies in this rugged town.
But I felt your sense of sophistication. Please! Please become my teacher and give me acting lessons.
And by a lesson, I mean all you have to do is just perform my weakest emote in front of me. That's all I need to learn!
Please! I really want to see an example of the 'Ethene Greeting' emote!

61088.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「ありがとうござ:
Thank you! To use emotes, press and please select the emote you want to use from the list.
By the way, teacher, do you know about the Ethene Greeting? The Etheneans are a fabled people in Lendersian legends; said to have died out long ago.
The Ethene Greeting is rumored to have been passed down, but... I haven't been able to capture the essence of it.
Even if you don't remember the Ethene Greeting now, if you continue your journey, you're bound to pick it up somewhere along the way.
And I want you to show me the Ethene Greeting that only you, teacher, can do! Well then, teacher! Thank you for your guidance!

61090.「ありがとうございます！\n ……あれ？ 先生は ずいぶん\n 多くのお仕事を:
Thank you very much! Huh? You must have a lot of work to do. You can take care of mine later, so please go ahead and finish your work
first. I am looking forward to your lessons!

61091.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「そうですか……。で:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>I see. But I really want to take your lessons!

61095.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr><icon_ex:

Can you please give me a lesson right away? I'd really
like to see the emote 'Ethene Greeting'!<open_irai><bw_break>

61096.「見せてくれるなら 私の目の前で\n エテーネのあいさつを 使ってみてください。:

61101.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「なんて 壮大な:

61109.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「先生の演技 す:

61111.<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>「本日は ありが:

67526.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「そして いつか:

61112.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「私 先生の演技:

34487.「ひっひっひっ……。\n わたくしめが 求めてやまぬのは しかるべき時\n お導:
Hee hee hee. The only one I seek is the warrior who is destined to guide me at the proper time. Whether the rest of you live a
miserable life or die a respectable death is of no concern to me at all. Hee hee hee. You are a warrior, but you are a novice with a
level of less than 10. I'm sorry, but I can't help you.

47531.「ひっひっひっ……。\n わたくしめが 求めてやまぬのは\n レベル１０以上の:
I am a warrior. The only person I seek is a level 10 or above warrior. Whether the rest of you live miserably or die honorably is of no
concern to me at all.

34488.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「すぐそこの家に:
An old man named Agapei, who lives just a few houses away, gathers those who want to become strong warriors and teaches them how to do it.
He is a shady character by all accounts, but warriors from all walks of life come to visit him.

34489.「ひっひっひっ……。\n ようこそ おいでくださいました。\n レベル１０以上の:
Heheheh... Welcome, please come in, lvl10+ warrior.
Battling all day, every day... It's a youthful feeling when you are beginning to develop your strength as a warrior, isn't it.

34490.「わたくしめには わかります。\n その肉体の かがやき…… あなたさまには\n:
I can see it with my own eyes. That shining physique... You have the makings of wonderful warrior.
Please allow me to guide you.

34491.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「まことに 残念でご:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>We are truly sorry for your loss. If you
change your mind, please come visit us
anytime.

34492.「ひっひっひっ……。\n このアガペイ 必ずや あなたさまを\n まことの戦士へ:
Heheheh... Thank you, I will surely guide you towards being a true warrior.
A true warrior is one who possesses a righteous heart. Only those who overcome my trials and obtain the important items will be able to attain it.
Then, for the first trial, I would like you to go south of Glen Territory East to Gert Strait as a warrior.

34493.「あなたさまの心意気…… このアガペイが\n しかと 受け止めさせていただきまし:
Your spirit... I certainly acknowledge it. Well, I pray for your safety. ...With this, the way is opened.
In a northern cave of Gert Strait, it seems that a beacon whose fire has gone out will guide you.
This is a warrior's trial, so don't forget to go in as a warrior. Heheheh...

34494.「あなたさまの心意気…… このアガペイが\n しかと 受け止めさせていただきまし:
I am very pleased to accept your kindness, Agapei. ...Is what I would like to say, but it seems that you have too many requests already.
I am sorry for your disappointment. Whenever you are free, please come and see us.

34495.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「残念無念でございま:

34509.<close_irai>「ひっひっひっ……。\n このアガペイ 必ずや あなたさ:

34510.「ひっひっひっ……。\n 今回も すばらしい\n 戦いっぷりでございましたな。\:
Heheheh... You fought well again this time. You steadily climb the steps as a true warrior.
Now, allow me to give you an item as congratulations.

34511.「あなたさまが 魔物と思って 殺したもの。\n あれは いったい なんであったの:
The thing you killed because you thought it was a monster. I wonder what in the world that was...
Heheheh... The feelings swirling in your heart are precisely what I wanted to present to you.
Now that you've come this far, I hope you won't give up and will stay with me until the end.

34512.「あなたさまが 魔物と思って 殺したもの。\n あれは いったい なんであったの:

Heheheh... The feelings swirling in your heart are precisely what I wanted to present to you.
Now that you've come this far, I hope you won't give up and will stay with me until the end.

47534.「あなたさまが 魔物と思って 殺したもの。\n あれは いったい なんであったの:

Now that you've come this far, I hope you won't give up and will stay with me until the end.
If you are ready for the next trial, please become a level 20+ warrior and come to us.

34513.「ひっひっひっ……。\n 待ちわびておりましたよ 戦士さま。\n<br>\n「前:
Heheheh... I was getting tired of waiting for you, warrior.
Since the last trial, you must have continued your training, plagued by anxiety
and doubt. But you have come like this. The strength of your heart, I... I'm proud.
The next trial will be at Nagua Caves, west of the
Rangao Mountains, and I hope you will go as the warrior you have always been.

34514.「あなたさまの心意気…… このアガペイが\n しかと 受け止めさせていただきまし:
We at Agapei are very pleased to accept your spirit. Now let's spell it out. Now the way is open. The way is now clear. The extinguished
bonfire in the back of the cave will guide you. This is a warrior's trial, so remember to go in as a warrior. Hee hee hee.

34515.「あなたさまの心意気…… このアガペイが\n しかと 受け止めさせていただきまし:

34518.「次なる試練の地は\n ランガーオ山地 西の ナグアの洞くつ。\n 戦士のままで:
The next trial will be in Nagua Caves, west of
the Rangao Mountains. Please go as a warrior.<open_irai><bw_break>

34519.<close_irai>「ひっひっひっ……。\n このアガペイ 必ずや あなたさ:
<close_irai>Heheheh... Thank you, I will surely guide
you towards being a true warrior.

34520.「ひっひっひっ……。\n 危ないところで ございましたな。\n<br>\n「あの:
Heheheh... That was a close call.
If you had killed Legion, you would have fell to the same level as the crazed warrior Legion, don't you agree.
...However, in that trial you made the decision to break away from that way of life and not to kill people.
That decision is an important one for you to continue to as a warrior. Please cherish it together alongside this item.

34521.「……もう おわかりでしょう。\n 火の消えた かがり火から 見せた世界は\n:
...By now, I'm sure you understand. The world you saw from the extinguished beacons were my past experiences...
In those days, I longed for strength and lived my life, never doubting that might meant right.
But it wasn't until I could have ended Legion's life that I realized that the strength I had searched for did not exist.
I was lucky to escape death, but that event changed me overnight into an old man. As a warrior, I died at that moment.
Since then, I disciplined myself to show young warriors what befalls foolish warriors.
With the hope that the intense strength that only warriors possess will be put to good use.

34522.「悪逆を尽くしてきた わたくしめだからこそ\n 若き戦士たちに チカラだけを求め:
It is precisely because I am the one who has done everything wrong that I am able to show the young warriors the end of a warrior who
has only sought power. As long as you continue to be a warrior, there is a possibility that you will fall into a beserker. If you are
afraid of that, it is better to go your own way. However, if you intend to continue to live as a warrior, I would like to entrust you
with my true wish. When you become a warrior of level 25 or above, please come here.

47535.「悪逆を尽くしてきた わたくしめだからこそ\n 若き戦士たちに チカラだけを求め:
It is precisely because I am the one who has done everything wrong that I am able to show the young warriors the end of a warrior who
has only sought power. As long as you continue to be a warrior, there is a possibility that you will fall into a beserker. If you are
afraid of that, it is better to go your own way. However, if you intend to continue to live as a warrior, I would like to entrust you
with my true wish. Please become a level 25+ warrior and come to us.

34524.「ひっひっひっ……。\n もうひとつの戦士の末路を知っても まだ\n 戦士として:
Heheheh... Even after knowing the warrior's fate, you are still training as a warrior.
It seems that the day has finally come for me to entrust you with my true wish, superior warrior.
Everything of the world that the extinguished beacon showed you was real. That was all of the teachings I have for you. Everything...
Legion, even now, exists. Until his life ends, whether his hands are severed or legs broken, he will continue to kill as a repulsive beserker...
There is no way to save those who have fell to being a beserker. Legion wanders Orseco Highlands, won't you bury him with your own hands?

34525.「ありがとうございます。レギオンは\n オルセコ高地 南東にある オゾの洞穴を根:
Thank you very much. Legion should be wandering to the southeast of the Orseco Highlands in Ozo Cave, searching for a stronger warrior.
Go as a warrior and he will certainly reveal himself to you.

34526.「ありがとうございます。\n<br>\n「……と 言いたいところでございますが\:
Thank you very much. ...Is what I would like to say, but it seems that you have too many requests already.
I am greatly disappointed... Whenever you are free, please come back anytime.

34527.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「残念無念でございま:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>I am greatly disappointed...
Should you have a change of heart, please
come back anytime.

34529.「レギオンは オルセコ高地 南東にある\n オゾの洞穴を根城に より強き戦士を求:
The Legion must be roaming the Ozo Caves in
the southeastern Orseco Highlands in search of
stronger warriors.<open_irai><bw_break>

34530.<close_irai>「戦士のままで行けば\n きっと 姿を 現しましょう。:
<close_irai>Go as a warrior and he will certainly
reveal himself to you.

34531.「お見事でございました。\n あなたさまの目を通して レギオンの最期を\n 見届:
You have done a wonderful job. Through your eyes, I witnessed Legion's final moments.
For burying Legion on my, a helpless ogre's, behalf, you have my sincerest gratitude...

34532.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「おや？ レギオ:
Hmm? It seems that your battle with Legion has awakened a new power within you.
Allow me to draw it out of you. .......

34534.「レギオンが いなくなったところで\n わたくしめの罪までもが\n 消え去ったわ:
Although Legion is gone, my sins are not...
From here on, I will continue to teach warriors the fate of those who lust for extraordinary power.

34535.「強さを求め その果てに たどり着けたとしても\n 心を失い 自分のことも わか:
It is not our true desire to become mad warriors who have lost their hearts and do not know themselves, even if they have reached the
end of their quest for strength. It is my way of guiding warriors to become those who possess a righteous heart and do not fall into
the madness of warriors. The next trial is the last trial. It is a trial to become a true warrior. If you become a warrior of level 30
or above, please join us.

47413.「強さを求め その果てに たどり着けたとしても\n 心を失い 自分のことも わか:
It is not our true desire to become mad warriors who have lost their hearts and do not know themselves, even if they have reached the
end of their quest for strength. It is my way of guiding warriors to become those who possess a righteous heart and do not fall into
the madness of warriors. The next trial is the last trial. It is a trial to become a true warrior. Please become a warrior of level 30
or above and come to us.

34536.「ひっひっひっ……。\n 見事 強き 戦士さまに\n なられたようでございますね:
Heheheh... It seems that you have become a mighty warrior.
The final trial is against the most fearsome opponent whom you have known. Defeat him and you will be a true warrior.
Your true enemy lies in Wena Islands, at the Poetry Ruins within Booner Rainforest, are you prepared for battle?

34537.「あなたさまの決意…… このアガペイが\n しかと 受け止めさせていただきました:
Your resolve... I certainly acknowledge it. If you cannot overcome this trial, please abandon the way of the warrior.
I ask you to be prepared to do so. This is the final warrior's trial, so don't forget to go in as a warrior.

34538.「あなたさまの決意…… このアガペイが\n しかと 受け止めさせていただきました:
Your resolve... I certainly acknowledge it. ...Is what I would like to say, but it seems that you have too many requests already.
I am greatly disappointed... Whenever you are free, please come back anytime.

34539.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「残念無念でございま:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>I am greatly disappointed...
Should you have a change of heart, please
come back anytime.

34541.「最後の試練の地は ウェナ諸島の 詩歌の遺跡。\n ブーナー熱帯雨林にございます:
The final trial lies in Wena Islands,
at the Poetry Ruins within Booner Rainforest.
Please go there as a warrior.<open_irai><bw_break>

34542.<close_irai>「これは 最後にして もっとも重要な試練。\n この試練:
<close_irai>This is the final and most important trial.
If you cannot overcome this trial, please
abandon the way of the warrior.

34543.「よくぞ ご無事で お帰りになりました。\n このアガペイ これほど感動に震えた:
Well done for returning safely. I, Agapei, have never been so moved as I have been today.
A beserker is in every warrior's heart in the form of their other self.
It is a deep darkness that grows stronger with every battle. The lust for power and desire to obtain it is one all warriors have at one point...
However, you have seen the darkness in your own heart... And defeated the beserker.

34544.「おのれの狂戦士を倒した者こそ まことの戦士。\n さあ 今こそ その証をここに:
The true enemy whom you have defeated
was your own beserker self.
Now, here is your proof...

34546.「あなたさまに つきまとい\n 喰らおうと 狙い続けていた 深き闇……\n あな:
The deep darkness that had been haunting you, aiming to continously eat at you... Your beserker has vanished.
Hereafter, you shall use your strength, not for lust, but for righteousness.

34547.「狂戦士とは どんな戦士の心にもある\n もうひとりの 自分の姿。\n 戦うたび:
A beserker is in every warrior's heart in the form of their other self.
It is a deep darkness that grows stronger with every battle.
Those who do not lose to that voice of darkness and defeat it with a strong heart, are true nwarriors.
Once one becomes a true warrior, the Way of the Warrior in the true sense of the idea will begin.
I hope you will continue to devote yourself to it.

69816.「ここは 冒険者の酒場じゃ。\n お前さんが 冒険者なら 絶対に\n 必要になる:
This is an adventurer's tavern. If you are an adventurer, you will definitely need this facility. You can ask your friends to help you
with request form quests. You should try it once.

48995.「人の一生など ほんのひと時\n うたた寝している間の 夢のようなもの。\n く:
A person's life is like a dream while he/she
is taking a nap for a moment. There is no use
in worrying about it.

34548.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「この国では ウ:
<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>This country is in need of skilled soldiers.
Those who think they have what it takes, come
forward!

34550.「バグド王は 心優しき王として 有名だが\n 皆のために 数々の凶悪な魔物を\n:
King Bagudo is famous for being a kind-hearted king, but he is also a brave warrior who has defeated many vicious monsters for the good of
all. He is a wonderful king who is willing to risk his life to fight for those he should protect! I must learn from him.

34551.「ここは グレン城。\n 偉大なるバグド王が おわす城だ。:
This is Glen Castle, where the great King
Bagudo resides.

34552.「ここから出ると グレン領西だ。\n グレン領東よりも 手強い魔物たちが\n た:
Out here is Glen West. It is home to many more powerful monsters than Glen East. North of Glen West, there is Becon Valley, which is
inhabited by more powerful monsters. You should go there after you have completed your training.

34553.<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>「もうすぐ いく:
<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>I guess I am about to start! King Bagudo used
to be a bloodthirsty young man. The blood of
those days seems to be alive and well today!

131167.「この国は 同じオーガの国である\n ガートラントとの いくさを控え\n 一人前:
This country is prepping for war with another Ogre country, Gartlant, by recruiting brave warriors with their Proof of Adulthood!
But, since you don't have your Proof of Adulthood, I jumped to conclusions, didn't I! Before anything else, you'd best stick to your hometown.

131750.「この国は 同じオーガの国である\n ガートラントとの いくさを控え\n 一人前:
This country is prepping for war with another Ogre country, Gartlant, by recruiting brave warriors with their Proof of Adulthood!
If you have Proof of Adulthood, I want you to become a soldier of this country and fight alongside us!
If you want to volunteer to be a soldier, go see King Bagudo at Glen Castle! The castle's entrance is just up these stairs.

34555.「いくさの相手 ガートラントにも鉄道駅はある。\n だが その駅を使えるのは\n:
Gartlant, the opponent of the ''Battle of Gartlant,'' also has a train station. However, only those who have permission from the King
of Gartlant can use the train station.

34556.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「うちでは お城:
We sometimes entertain important guests who come to the castle. The other day we welcomed Sage Malynn, who is famous for her healing
arts.

34557.「グレン城下町へ ようこそ。\n ここまで来るのは 大変だったでしょう。\n ま:
Welcome to Glen Castle Town. It must have been hard work to get here. Please take your time and look around the town. You can register as
a friend at the tavern, and if you do what the introducer asks, you will be able to use the tavern. There is also a Vocation Priest. There
is also a Travel Concierge at the inn who offers a variety of services. You can register by talking to the information desk. After you
have had a chance to look around the town, you should be able to solve the town's problems. If the enemies are strong, you may want to
level up, change jobs, or try another location. If you have a Rail Pass, you can take the train to other continents. I hear it
is very rare to get a pass. And if anyone has anything to tell you, please wipe your wipe all pink.dark reddish purpleI am a member of the ''Migrant Workers Association''. If you find them, please talk to them.

61084.「グレン城下町へ ようこそ。\n ここまで来るのは 大変だったでしょう。\n ひ:
Welcome to Glen Castle Town. I know it must have been hard to get here. I have something good thing to tell you.
If someone happens to want to tell you something, they will have a pink speech bubble or a purple , like Gord in front of the stairs.
I recommend you to talk to Mr. Gord right away!

129934.「ここは グレン城下町です。\n ここから出ると グレン領東で\n 獅子門や ラ:
This is Glen Castle Town. From here, you can go to Glen East, where you can also go to Lion Gate and Rangao Village. Glen East is a place
where weaker monsters inhabit around Glen Castle. If you want to start your training, this is the best place to start. And for those
of you who have something to tell me, the wipeout is pink.dark reddish purpleI am a member of the ''Migrant Workers Association''. If you find them, please talk to them.

129935.「ここは グレン城下町です。\n ここから出ると グレン領東で\n 獅子門や ラ:
This is Glen Castle Town. From here, you can go to Glen East, where you can also go to Lion Gate and Rangao Village. Glen East is a place
where weaker monsters inhabit around Glen Castle. If you want to start your training, this is the best place to start. And for those
of you who have something to tell me, the wipeout is pink.dark reddish purpleI'm like Gord in front of the stairs. Like Mr. Gord in front of the stairs. I recommend you to talk to Mr. Gord right away!

34559.「ガートラントは はるか南の オーガの国。\n 今までは グレンと友好的な関係を:
Gartlant is far to the south in the land of Ogre. They have had friendly relations with Glen until now, but if you look back at their
history, they have fought each other in the past. When the war begins, old scores will be settled, and the two nations will fight until
one of them is completely destroyed.

36589.「ああっ 困りますわ。こんな所に入られては\n 他のお客さまの ご迷惑になってし:
Oh, no, that's not good. You are disturbing
other customers by coming in here. Please
leave.

34560.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「あんた 一人前:
Don't you have Proof of Adulthood? Then you will never be a soldier of Glen Castle. First, you'll have to go back home and be recognized
as one. Good luck!

34561.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「兵士になって:
Those who become a soldier and win an war will receive the Black Key Emblem, a symbol of Glen Castle's heroism. King Bagudo is really
putting a lot of effort into this war.

34562.「グレン城の王 バグドさまは\n 温厚で誠実なお方さ！\n<br>\n「そんなお:
King Bagudo of Glen Castle is a kind and honest
man! How dare Gartlant's men do such a
terrible thing to offend him!

34563.<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>「私は 前から:
I've always had a problem with the Gartlanders. I'm going to teach them a lesson for abandoning the Ogre way of life and living
comfortably in the harsh environment where they have to work themselves up!

34564.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「ガートラントと い:
<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>I can't believe I'm going to Gartlant. There
are many people in this town who have family
and friends in Gartlant.

34565.「主人は グレン城の兵士なんです。\n まじめで 剣の修行にも熱心だから\n い:
The master is a soldier of Glen Castle. He is a serious man who trains hard with his sword, so he is always covered in scratches. I'm
going to give him the best medicine so that he can fight to the end in the next battle.

34567.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「いくさなんて イヤ:
<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>I don't want to go to school. I don't want my
father to hurt anyone, and I don't want him to
hurt me.

34568.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「でっかい岩山を:
Ogre's power is unbelievable to cut down a huge rocky mountain and build a town like this! If some of them get into trouble,
they'll have to fight against each other, won't they? I get scared just thinking about it.

34570.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「宿屋を探してい:
<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>Are you looking for an inn? Just a little
further up the stairs on the left.

34571.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「うちでは お城:
We sometimes entertain important guests who come to the castle. The other day we welcomed Sage Malynn, famous for her healing arts. Now
we have the amazing Sage Eidos from Lendersia. I've taken you to the best room in the house!

34572.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「宿屋を探してらっし:
Are you looking for an inn? Then this is not the way to go. It's just down the stairs and to the right. I can't believe I'm here. Many
people here in Castle Town have family and friends in Gartlant.

34573.「ここから出ると グレン領西だ。\n グレン領東よりも 手強い魔物たちが\n た:
Out here is Glen West. It's home to a lot more tough monsters than Glen East. If you want to go to Becon Valley, follow Glen West west and
turn north at the first fork! If you follow the map, you won't get lost. However, there are rumors that the cave northwest of Becon
Valley has a scary monster. Be careful!

34574.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「ベコン渓谷へ行:
<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>You're going to Becon Valley? Then you should
take the west exit down the hill, not the east
exit!

34575.「そこにいるのは エイドスさま！ \n もー エイドスさまと お出かけなんて\n:
There he is, Master Eidos! I'm so envious that you're going out with Master Eidos!
To obtain Realm's Chalice, you're going to Becon Valley, right? Make sure you live up to Master Eidos' expectations!
To get to Becon Valley, take the west exit out of town, follow the road down Glen West, and turn north at the first fork in the road.
Realm's Chalice is said to sleep in a cave northwest of Becon Valley. Please be careful!

34576.「ここは グレン城下町です。\n ここから出ると グレン領東で\n 獅子門や ラ:
This is Glen Castle Town. From here, you can go to Glen East, where you can also go to Lion Gate and Rangao Village. Glen East is a place
where weaker monsters inhabit around Glen Castle. If you want to start your training, this side is the best place. If you want to go
to Becon Valley, please take the west exit on the other side, not this exit.

34577.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「あんただろ？\:
It was you, wasn't it? The old man Eidos sent you to Becon Valley. The old man behind you is Mr. Eidos, isn't he? You must be very tired.
Why don't you take a break at the inn? The last room is reserved for Mr. Eidos, isn't it?

34578.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「エイドスさま お帰:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>Mr. Eidos, welcome back. And welcome back to
your escort.

34579.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「ランドン山脈の:
Cloudtop Lake in the Landon Mountains? If you want to go there, take the east exit right there. Go south through Glen East and all the way to
the southeast. Cloudtop Lake is said to be home to a fearsome dragon, so be careful just in case!

34580.「エイドスさま お帰りなさい。\n お付きの人も お帰りなさい～。\n<br>\:
Mr. Eidos, welcome back. Your attendant is also welcome back~. What? Are you going to Cloudtop Lake next to get the Droplet of Gloris needed
to heal the king? That's a lot of work. Attendants! Make sure you protect Eidos-sama! Cloudtop Lake is located at the top of the Landon
Mountains, far to the southeast. It's a bit far, so listen carefully. If you go south through Glen East, cross the bridge at Gert
Strait, and continue southeast, you will reach the Landon Mountains. Cloudtop Lake is in the southeast part of the Landon Mountains. If you
follow the map, you won't get lost, but please be careful! The dragon that appears at Cloudtop Lake is said to be very strong.

34581.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「ランドン山脈の:
Cloudtop Lake in the Landon Mountains? If you want to go there, take the east exit right there. What? You've already been to Cloudtop Lake and
slayed a dragon? You're an amazing person!

34582.「グロリスのしずくを 手に入れたのね！\n さあ 早く バグド王に飲ませてあげて:
You received Droplet of Gloris! Now, hurry up
and give it to King Bagudo!

34583.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「ガートラントと:
<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>The war with Gartlant has been canceled!
King Bagudo has sent word for everyone to
return to their daily routines!

34585.「バグド王は 心優しき王として 有名だが\n 皆のために 数々の凶悪な魔物を\n:
King Bagudo is famous for being a kind-hearted king, but he is also a brave warrior who has defeated many vicious monsters for the good of
all. Like him, I tried to put my life on the line for those I cared about, but it was difficult. I grieved and frightened my
daughter.

34586.「いくさは 取りやめか……。\n 若かりし頃の 暴れん坊バグド王復活かと\n 胸:
The war has been canceled, huh... I was so excited
to see the revival of King Bagudo in his
youth.

34587.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「聞いたか！？\:
Did you hear that? I heard that Ikuo and Gartlant cancelled! I know. I know, because of your efforts, right? I want to thank you on
behalf of all of us. Thank you!

34588.「ガートラントにも 鉄道駅はある。\n だが その駅を使えるのは\n ガートラン:
Gartlant also has a train station. However, only those who have permission from the King of Gartlant can use the train station.
Gartlant Castle is located beyond Gert Strait, Landonfoot and Zama Pass.

34589.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「やっぱり エイ:
<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>Eidos is really amazing! You cured King Bagudo
and stopped Ikuo. You did your best. You are
indeed Eidos' servant!

34590.「ガートラントは はるか南の オーガの国。\n 今までは グレンと友好的な関係を:
Gartlant is far to the south in the land of Ogre. Until now, they have had friendly relations with Glen, but if you look back at
their history, they have fought each other in the past. When the war began, the fates were united, and they would continue to fight until
one of their countries was destroyed. We Ogre are compassionate. When we get fired up for the sake of our companion or our sovereign,
nothing can stop us.

34591.「もしかして それは グレン城の英雄の証\n 黒のキーエンブレム！？\n すごい:
Could it be the Black Key Emblem, the heroic
symbol of Glen Castle? That's amazing! I've
never seen it before!

34592.「グレン城の王 バグドさまは\n 温厚で誠実なお方よ！\n<br>\n「いくさを:
King Bagudo of Glen Castle is a warm and
honest man! I guess King Bagudo has forgiven
Gartlant for quitting the war.

34593.「ガートラントのヤツらは 厳しい環境で\n おのれの身体を きたえあげるという\:
Those in Gartlant abandoned the Ogre way of life, which is to exhaust their bodies in a severe environment. But I already forgive them
for that. King Bagudo has also forgiven them.

34594.「この城下町には 家族や友人が\n ガートラントにいる人も 多いのよ。\n いく:
Many of us here in Castle Town have family and
friends in Gartlant. I'm so relieved that the
event has been canceled.

34595.「主人は グレン城の兵士なんです。\n まじめで 剣の修行にも熱心だから\n い:
The master is a soldier of Glen Castle. He is always covered in scratches because he is a serious person who is also dedicated to sword
training. Although the war has been canceled, he will continue to train hard to protect his beloved king.

34596.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「いくさ なくなった:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>No more worries, right? Your father doesn't
have to hurt anyone anymore, or be hurt by
anyone anymore, right?

34597.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「でっかい岩山を:
Ogre's are very powerful to carve out a huge rocky mountain and build a town like this! If Ogre and Ogre had fought each other, it would
have been a bloodbath. Just thinking about it is terrifying.

34598.<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>「もうっ。フルッ:
Auntie Fluka always goes off somewhere without cleaning her room! I wish she'd think about how I feel when I come to clean my room every
day. I don't know any other adult who is that lazy.

34599.『グレン城の歴史』という\nほこりをかぶった 古い書物がある。\n<pc>は 手:
There is a dusty old book titled ''History of
Glen Castle''. <pc> picked it up and
read it.

34600.グレン城は ……き………の戦士たちが\n険しい…に切り……いた ………高き…であ:
Glen Castle is the height where the warriors
of the mushrooms had cut into the rugged, but
its history was also unbroken.

43572.………年前 …災…に……われた わが国は\n……たちによって ……うばわれ\n彼:
Years ago, our country was swept away by them,
and they wanted him to fight.

43573.書物は ところどころ\n虫に食われていて 読めなかった。:
The book was unreadable because it was eaten
by insects in places.

43574.『わが一族に伝わる秘術』という\nほこりをかぶった 古い書物がある。\n<pc>:
There is a dusty old book titled ''The Secrets
of My Family''. <pc> picked it up and
read it.

43575.わが一族に 代々伝わる秘術。\nその歴史をひもとくと ４人の異なる種族の\n術師:
A secret art that has been passed down in my family for generations. The history of this art begins with the meeting of four different
races of surgeons.

43576.４人の術師は お互いの術を\n悪しきチカラに 利用されぬよう\nある取り決めをし:
The four sorcerers made an arrangement to
prevent each other's arts from being used by
evil forces.

43577.しかし その取り決めも もう意味はない。\nわが一族の術は 語られることのない\:
But that arrangement is meaningless now. The
art of my family has disappeared into the
darkness of history.

34602.『グレン城の歴史』という\n古い書物が きれいに収められている。\n<pc>は:
The old book ''The History of Glen Castle'' is
neatly tucked away. <pc> picked it up
and read it.

34603.グレン城は たけきオーガの戦士たちが\n険しい崖に切り開いた ほまれ高き城である:
Glen Castle is a glorious castle that was carved out of a steep cliff by the warriors of Ogre, but its history has been anything but
tranquil.

34604.５００年前 大災害にみまわれた 我が国は\n人間たちによって 城を奪われ\n彼ら:
Five hundred years ago, our country was struck
by a catastrophe when humans took our castles
and tried to wage war on them.

34605.しかし 破邪舟師の少年と その友の行動が\nいがみあう 我らの心を解かしてくれた:
But the actions of the Ship Shaper's boy and his friends have broken the hearts of those who have been at odds with each other. They
are the heroes who saved Glen.

34606.『エルジュの手記』という\n古い書物が きれいに収められている。\n<pc>は:
The old book, ''Erju's Memoirs'', is neatly
tucked away. <pc> picked it up and
read it.

34607.……大災害 レイダメテスの混乱の中\n我が一族に伝わる 破邪舟の術は\nその継承:
In the chaos of the Reidametes catastrophe,
the family tradition of the art of the Sacred
Ship was in doubt as to its legitimacy.

34608.しかし 未来からやってきたという\n不思議な旅人の導きで 誇りとは何かを知り\n:
But with the guidance of a mysterious traveler
from the future, I learned what pride is and I
inherited the art.

34609.<if_woman>……私は 彼女と約束を交わした。\nいずれ訪れる 未来の災厄:
I made a promise to her. I promised her that my descendants would do everything in their power to prevent future disasters that would
eventually come.I made a promise to him. I promised him that my descendants would do everything in their power to prevent future disasters.

34610.破邪舟師たちよ 心せよ。\n最愛の友 <pc>のために\n我らの術を 決して 絶:
Ship Shapers, be mindful. Never cease our art
for the sake of our beloved friend
<pc>.
